name: We Are Bonded Kin
description:
In an ancient village that traditionally holds childhood friendships as one of the highest and revered bonds, your childhood friend Sage is then cast under a witch's dark curse that takes over her life and changes her for the worse... can you break this curse in this test of bonds and bring Sage home, or will it tear your friendship and love apart?

Genre: Dark, Tragedy, Horror, GxG, Fantasy

Current Features: 

  • 2 mini games
  •  1 route, along with many bad ending deaths

Content Warning: Depression, Jump Scares, Violence, Death

Note: Although the first route of this interactive fiction is playable and completed, there are things I want to further implement (CG art, sprite art for side characters, two more alternative routes, special effects, music, and to polish/edit the rough writing) so it is still in development.
